title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 508.3 - Administering officials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 508.3 - Administering officials

State Regulations

Each local social services commissioner acting under the
direction of the local civil defense director and acting in his civil defense
capacity, shall make provisions for furnishing defense emergency aid to all
persons residing or found in his territory and in need thereof because of
attack. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
508.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
